About Me

Welcome to my site! I’m a full stack developer living in Augusta, Georgia. I am currently a full time student and about to finish up my last semester at Augusta University.

Along with my formal education, and past work experience, I have been recently working on a few personal projects to become more familiar working with languages that I’m more new to such as Python. I created this website to present my skills, interests, and to make connections with developers or other individuals like me.

While the site is in its infancy right now I’m looking forward to expanding it and letting it grow as my knowledge and experiences grow!

Skills and Experiences

  • C#
  • Java
  • SQL
  • Haskell
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • Python

C#

3 years desktop application development (WPF, WinForms), ASP.NET Web API development, and other various asynchronous service development.

Java

4 years of desktop application development along with creating UI via JavaFX, creating networking applications, and other various desktop games.

Web

2 years of experience with creating beautify and responsive UI, working with frameworks such as AngularJS 1.x, and working with other tools such as Bootstrap4 and JQuery. This site uses no external libraries beside JQuery and FontAwesome.

SQL

3 years experience with creating statements and using SQL across many database schemas including Oracle DB, MySql, and SQLite.

Python and Haskell

6 months experience with using these languages to write scripts for app and website bots that communicate with published API.
